member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.MsmqDistributor.ServiceStatus
member.summary: The Service status enum (as byte) This status is used to flag the service it should be shut down or not.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.MsmqDistributor.ServiceStatus.OK
member.summary: The service is running fine and should not be shut down.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.MsmqDistributor.ServiceStatus.Shutdown
member.summary: The service has encountered a problem or has been directed to shut down.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.MsmqDistributor.ServiceStatus.PendingShutdown
member.summary: The service has encountered a problem or has been directed to shut down and cannot shut down due to errors.
